properties.name: appLink
properties.summary: An app link target that will be used as a target when the user accept the invite.
properties.description: This is a requirement. You can find out more about app links here.

properties.name: appPreviewImageLink
properties.summary: A URL to a preview image that will be displayed with the app invite
properties.description: This is optional. If you don't include it a fallback image will be used.
